SEARCH
Module com.example.historian
Package com.example.historian.models.person

Interface IPersonDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockPersonDAO, SqlitePersonDAO
public interface IPersonDAO
The IPersonDAO interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Person objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    addPerson(Person person)
    Adds a new person to the data store.
    List<Person>
    getAllPersons()
    Retrieves all persons from the data store.
    Person
    getPerson(int id)
    Retrieves a person by their ID.
    void
    removePerson(Person person)
    Removes a person from the data store.

  • Method Details

    • addPerson

      int addPerson(Person person)
      Adds a new person to the data store.
      Parameters:
      person - the Person object to be added

    • removePerson

      void removePerson(Person person)
      Removes a person from the data store.
      Parameters:
      person - the Person object to be removed

    • getPerson

      Person getPerson(int id)
      Retrieves a person by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the person to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the Person object with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • getAllPersons

      List<Person> getAllPersons()
      Retrieves all persons from the data store.
      Returns:
      a list of all Person objects
